comment: He's condescending and picky. Most of his lessons are about notation, which is like the admin of music. He doesn't discus the development or themes of a song. He also forgets what he's taught you already. The program is for concert composers, though he's trying to collab with other departments, but if you're into modern genres, KSU is not for you.

This class was an easy A. I'm a com major and only took this course to fill In the gaps in my schedule. I wouldn't take this class again because he kind of comes off a bit racist. With a class of only 6, the majority being white and the other 2 being different races, he seemed to always have a non-related question about race. overall pretty decent
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Not the best professor. Class was extremely boring and did not really follow the catalog description. Not worth the money.
Tough tests, but extremely helpful professor!
